page.title: 20PEOPLE
page.content: STAUNTON ON WYE PEOPLE IN THE AREA The population of Staunton and the surrounding area is an ageing one, and this tendency is becoming more marked as more people retire here and as the young move away in pursuit of jobs or houses. Some houses are also let as holiday homes with an adverse effect on local life. Many new people have moved into the area over the last few years and the number of native inhabitants is falling. The social structure of the area is very mixed, with a wide variety of occupations - farmers, factory workers, office & shop staff and even a professional violinist. It is a close and caring community where people look after each other and good neighbourliness is prized and encouraged.
